result.title: Virtual Contests of OpenCup GPs
result.content:
As we all know that most of the users are not able to participate in GP contests by OpenCup due to registration issue. I thought of gathering the links of GP contest which are available in the gym. Currently, I have got one recent GP contest in the gym.

I request everybody to comment the links to more GP contests which are in the gym so that we can get all links at single place. I request to OpenCup for adding the contests in Gym so that everyone can solve the problems or take part in virtual contests.

GP Contest of Saratov 2017-18
